name: a monologue about dreams
description:
a monologue about dreams is an interactive monologue about... well, dreams.

The idea for this came from the thought that there aren't many games I know of that challenge the players to think. And I don't mean in the puzzle game way - I mean in the self-reflective/philosophical way. My original idea was to have this be like a conversation with an AI, but I figured that I'd make the theme of the monologue about a personal struggle instead.
